description: Dual paths of searing judgment (Radiance) and protective healing (Sanctuary).

abilities.name: Glimmer
abilities.effect: Create a flash of light. Enemies within 15 feet must make a Might DC 12 check or be 'Blinded' for 1 round.

abilities.name: Sacred Flame
abilities.effect: Hurl a bolt of white-hot fire, dealing 1d8 light damage. This ability has a lower DC.

abilities.name: Searing Bolt
abilities.effect: A bolt of pure light strikes a single target, dealing 1d10 light damage.

abilities.name: Holy Weapon
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you imbue a weapon with divine light. For 3 rounds, the weapon attacks deal an additional 1d6 light damage on a successful hit. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after a successful attack, the target must make a Mind DC 11 check or have a -1 penalty on their next roll.

abilities.name: Divine Push
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can unleash a burst of light in a 15-foot cone. Enemies hit must make an Agility DC 12 check or be pushed back 10 feet. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Sunray
abilities.effect: A beam of pure light strikes a single target, dealing 2d8 light damage.

abilities.name: Searing Orb
abilities.effect: Hurl an orb of sunlight that explodes, dealing 3d8 light damage in a 10-foot radius.

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.effect: When an enemy attacks you, you can use a reaction to deal 1d8 light damage to them. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Light Prison
abilities.effect: You can attempt to restrain a target with chains of light. The target must make a Might DC 13 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Radiant Burst
abilities.effect: All creatures in a 15-foot radius around you take 2d6 light damage and have a -2 penalty to their next attack roll. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Divine Judgement
abilities.effect: A searing beam deals 2d10 radiant damage to a target and prevents them from taking a reaction.

abilities.name: Blinding Judgement
abilities.effect: Enhances Divine Judgement. The target must also succeed on a Might DC 15 check or become 'Blinded' for 1 round.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.effect: Call down three bolts of starlight. You can target one enemy three times or up to three different enemies. Each bolt deals 2d8 light damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Aura of Censure
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, you project a 15-foot aura. Any enemy that starts their turn inside the aura takes 1d10 light damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Pillar of Dawn
abilities.effect: Call down a pillar of light, dealing 5d10 light damage to enemies and healing allies for 2d10 Vitality in a 15-foot radius.

abilities.name: Divine Weapon
abilities.effect: You can use a bonus action to give a weapon you are holding the `Light` property. For 3 rounds, attacks made with it have a +2 bonus to their attack roll. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Sanctified Smite
abilities.effect: As a major action, you make a single attack with a bonus of 3d10 light damage. This attack automatically hits and ignores all of the target's non-magical Damage Reduction. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Heavens
abilities.effect: Deals 6d12 light damage to all enemies you can see and they must make a Spirit DC 18 check or be 'Stunned' for 1 round. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Final Judgment
abilities.effect: Choose a single target. That creature must make a Spirit DC 18 check. On a failure, they take 8d10 light damage, and their Vitality maximum is permanently reduced by half of the damage dealt. Usable once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Healing Aura
abilities.effect: Restore 1d6 Vitality to all allies within a 10-foot radius.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, touch an object and cause it to shed bright, magical sunlight for 1 hour.

abilities.name: Mending Light
abilities.effect: Touch an ally and restore 2d6 Vitality.

abilities.name: Soothing Aura
abilities.effect: Enhances Healing Aura. You can choose for it to heal no Vitality to instead restore 1d8 Resolve to all affected allies.

abilities.name: Divine Barrier
abilities.effect: As a reaction, you can grant an adjacent ally a temporary shield that absorbs up to 5 points of magical damage for 1 round.

abilities.name: Cleansing Touch
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can touch a target and remove one minor negative status effect (e.g., Blinded, Slowed).

abilities.name: Aura of Purity
abilities.effect: Create a 10-foot aura that removes one negative status effect from all allies within.

abilities.name: Shield of Faith
abilities.effect: As a Reaction when an ally is hit, reduce the damage taken by 1d10 + your Spirit attribute.

abilities.name: Beacon of Hope
abilities.effect: Create a stationary beacon. Allies near it can end fear effects on themselves and regain 1d8 Resolve.

abilities.name: Mass Mending
abilities.effect: All allies within a 15-foot radius are healed for 2d8 Vitality. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Hallowed Ground
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, you consecrate a 15-foot radius area. Allies who start their turn in the area regain 1d6 Vitality. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flood
abilities.effect: You send out a wave of purifying light in a 20-foot cone. All allies in the area are healed for 3d8 Vitality and cured of one status effect. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Divine Purpose
abilities.effect: You can touch an ally as a bonus action, granting them a +2 bonus to their next attack roll and a +2 bonus to their next defensive roll. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Resolute Will
abilities.effect: All allies within 30 feet gain advantage on checks to resist mind-altering or possession effects for 3 rounds. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Warding Light
abilities.effect: You conjure a shield of light around all allies within 30 feet. They gain resistance to magical damage for 1 round. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Guardian Spirit
abilities.effect: Summon a spirit to protect an ally. The first time that ally would be reduced to 0 Vitality, the attack is negated and they are healed for 4d10 Vitality.

abilities.name: Mass Revive
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can target up to two 'Downed' allies and restore them to 1 Vitality. They also regain 5 Resolve. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Aegis of the Heavens
abilities.effect: You grant all allies resistance to a single type of damage (physical or magical) for 3 rounds. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Genesis
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, all allies regain 3d10 Vitality at the start of your turn. Allies cannot be reduced below 1 Vitality. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Divine Intervention
abilities.effect: You restore the Vitality of all allies to full and cleanse all negative status effects. The effect is instantaneous and usable once per day. This costs 20 Resolve.
